commit.message:
regmove.c (fixup_match_1): Consistently evaluate HAVE_POST_INCREMENT and HAVE_POST_DECREMENT.

        * regmove.c (fixup_match_1): Consistently evaluate
        HAVE_POST_INCREMENT and HAVE_POST_DECREMENT.
